name: Unlisted levels in saved
description: Will show if a level is unlisted / friends only

issues.info: You can report issues on the Github issue tracker !

show-clock-icon.name: Show clock icon
show-clock-icon.description: When a level will be put in queue to check if it's unlisted or not, a clock will appear. This setting will decide if it will show or not.

queue-requests.name: Search for levels' properties
queue-requests.description: This will queue requests to find if a level is friends only / unlisted. If disabled, the mod won't try to search for unlfriends only / unlisted isted levels.

queue-requests-timing.name: Queue requests timing
queue-requests-timing.description: This is the time to wait between each requests to find out if the level is unlisted or not.

reset-saved-infos-button.name: Reset saved infos
reset-saved-infos-button.description: This will remove every informations about each levels (= is unlisted, is friends only, was queued)
